ddf.catalog.impl.operations

Class UpdateOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • ddf.catalog.impl.operations.UpdateOperations

  • public class UpdateOperations
extends Object
    Support class for update delegate operations for the CatalogFrameworkImpl.

    This class contains two delegated update methods and methods to support them. No operations/support methods should be added to this class except in support of CFI update operations.
